mainText: The Xbox One has come a long way since its 2013 debut. Microsoft has fixed the console's hardware flaws with the One S and the recently released One X, but now it has a different.

titleText: The missing link in Microsoft’s A.I. strategy
mainText: The future belongs to the tech company that best harnesses artificial intelligence. A.I. is vital to understanding what consumers want and thus better design products for them. It is crucial in attracting consumers by delivering.

titleText: This Pro Xbox One Controller Is Almost Perfect
mainText: I know perfection doesn’t exist, but Razer’s latest console accessory effort is almost enough to make me a believer. Let’s get this out of the way up front: The Wolverine Ultimate, a professional-grade gamepad for both.
